channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Gwolle Guestbook
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Gwolle Guestbook

item.title: CVE-2021-24980|2024-08-03T19:49:14.367Z -- unknown -- gwolle%20guestbook
item.description: The Gwolle Guestbook WordPress plugin before 4.2.0 does not sanitise and escape the gwolle_gb_user_email parameter before outputting it back in an attribute, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue in an admin page
